original_title: Sathosa reduces prices of ten essential consumer products
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Lanka Sathosa Limited on Friday (24) announced that the prices of 10 essential consumer products were reduced. The price reduction will come into effect from Friday (24).
5. 1 kg of Local Samba Rice: Reduced by Rs. 11/- to Rs. 199/-
CAA to raid shops violating consumer laws during festive season
